name: MVPet's Github Page
body:
### Welcome to MVPet's Github Page
This is the page where all my major projects are hosted.
The source is available to download, each project has a demo video showing it off, and most projects are playable in your browser.


### Major Projects include:

### Advance Wars X Fire Emblem
A turn based SRPG fusing two of Nintendo's best SRPGs.
Developed using C++ and SFML API.

[http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW](http://mvpet.github.io/FEXAW)

### Megaman Battle Chip Challenge Battle Arena
A game that integrates MOBA elements into Battle Network's gameplay.
Was developed using C# and Unity 2D.

[http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/](http://mvpet.github.io/MMBNNE/)

### Buoyancy Simulation
A project I recently finished at ITMS at URI.
Was developed using C# and Unity3D.

[http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie](http://itmsunity.github.io/OceanMovie)

### Hunger Game
A project I developed for the Nutrition department at URI.
Was developed using ActionScript3 and Flixel API.

[http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating](http://mvpet.github.io/GreenEating)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
